a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The number of conflicts divided by the number of all state-pairs. This accounts for the changing number of states
over time. Included are conflicts between states where force was threatened, displayed, used, or escalated to a
Data source: Gibler and Miller - Militarized Interstate Events (2023); Correlates of War - State System Membership (2017)
Note: Some conflicts affect several regions. The sum across all regions can therefore be higher than the global number.
